title: # 296 - Jessa Reed & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Jessa Reed to talk about Meth Pee, Jessa's near death experience, The owl story, getting married at 16, and much more!

Check out her Podcast "The Mormon and the Meth head" 

Follow Jessa @JessaReedComedy or go to jessareed.com for tour dates and more!

This episode is brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get $125 off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. Get your first 3 meals free at www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH
click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
